subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: To sweeten his contract, the Hokkaido Nippon Ham Fighters allowed Shohei Otani to play the field on some nonpitching days, a concession in an age of specialization.
snippet: To sweeten his contract, the Hokkaido Nippon Ham Fighters allowed Shohei Otani to play the field on some nonpitching days, a concession in an age of specialization.
